name: Builders In Edinburgh Ltd
tag_list: builders-in-edinburgh, refurbishment-contractors, property-renovation-contractors, maintenace-contractors, kitchen-refurbishments, bathroom-renovations
overview:
Builders In Edinburgh is one of the leading building contractors and property Refurbishment / Maintenance specialists in Edinburgh and Central Scotland.

They have over 25 Years experience delivering a vast range of projects from large refurbishments, Planned and Reactive maintenance works and are Approved Insurance Building Repair Contractors for most of the Major Insurers and Adjusters.

Builders In Edinburgh offer a complete range of services to landlords. One call to them and they coordinate the trades required. This leaves you to do what you do best and avoid you having to make multiple calls to different tradesmen. They ensure the works are carried out swiftly and smoothly, keeping your tenants happy. Their aim Is to remove the burden on you the Landlord, and provide a first class customer service.

They also offer a bespoke package to suit the specific needs of clients. Whether it is a Loft Conversion, Garage Conversion, Basement Conversion or Structural Alterations.

They have offices in Edinburgh making them ideally placed to service clients throughout Edinburgh and Central Scotland. With our in-house team of Qualified Tradesmen of General Builders, Roofers, Joiners, Plasterers, Plumbers, Heating Engineers, Electricians, Decorators and Tilers, Then Builders In Edinburgh really are a one Stop Shop for all your building needs. They are also members of the FMB (Federation of Master Builders) & the Government backed TRUSTMARK, CHAS Health and Safety organisation, NICEIC, GAS Safe Register and thousands of satisfied clients.
